industry: Engines and Power Transmission Equipment Manufacturing
description:
Role

As an Administrative Assistant / Office Manager (also known as Executive Assistant, Office Coordinator), you'll play a vital role in ensuring the efficient operation of our office. Your responsibilities will include managing office operations, providing administrative support to our team, coordinating meetings, and handling bookkeeping and HR tasks.

Benefits

  • Opportunity to work in a detail-oriented, organized environment.
  • Chance to develop and utilize a wide range of skills.
  • Key role in ensuring smooth office operations.

Qualifications

  • Proven experience as an administrative assistant or office manager.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite.
  • Excellent communication, organizational, and time management skills.
